jokes.part1: What’s the best thing about Switzerland?
jokes.part2: I don’t know, but the flag is a big plus.

jokes.part1: Hear about the new restaurant called Karma?
jokes.part2: There’s no menu: You get what you deserve.

jokes.part1: What is an astronaut’s favorite part on a computer?
Rest in peace to boiling water.
Want to hear a construction joke?
jokes.part2: Oh never mind, I’m still working on that one.

jokes.part1: Why did the gym close down?
Two artists had an art contest.
Why doesn’t the sun go to college?
jokes.part2: Because it has a million degrees!
Because nothing gets under their skin?
